name: Project PANS
description: Project specific EM for PANS project

project-settings.name:
Enable Debug Logging (Requires emLogger)
If you have questions enabling debugging, please contact the REDCap team for help.

PDF Merge Print Settings


Select the event and form names that you want merged in the PDF file.
Select the Visit event for which you print the PDF form (e.g. visit_arm_1)
Select the forms you want merged into the PDF. The sequence selected here will be preserved (e.g. pans_patient_questionnaire)
